content: k2tog and fasten_off darn in the end down the centre of the leaf but leave the cast on end to sew the leaf to the wreath small leaves using the long tail method cast on three stitches work four row in i cord now slide the stitches to the end of the needles as if you were going to carry on in i cord and cast on six more stitches use the cable method working into the back loop only for the first stitch and then through both loops as normal after that note all slipped stitches should be slipped purlwise with the yarn held at the front of the work row 1 knit 9 sts row 2 cast on 6 sts k6 p1 sl 1 p1 k6 15 sts row 3 kf&b k5 s2kp2 k6 14 sts row 4 kf&b k5 sl 1 k7 15 sts row 5 k6 s2kp2 k6 13 sts row 6 k6 sl 1 k6 row 7 cast off 1 k3 s2kp2 k5 10 sts row 8 cast off 1 k3 sl 1 k4 9 sts row 9 cast on 3 k6 s2kp2 k3 10 sts row 10 cast on 3 k6 sl 1 k6 13 sts row 11 kf&b k4 s2kp2 k5 12 sts row 12 kf&b k4 sl 1 k6 13 sts row 13 k5 s2kp2 k5 11 sts row 14 k5 sl 1 k5 row 15 cast off 1 k2 s2kp2 k4 8 sts row 16 cast off 1 k2 sl 1 k3 7 sts row 17 cast on 2 k4 s2kp2 k2 7 sts row 18 cast on 2 k4 sl 1 k4 9 sts row 19 k3 s2kp2 k3 7 sts row 20 k3 sl 1 k3 row 21 k2 s2kp2 k2 5 sts row 22 k2 sl 1 k2 row 23 k3 k2tog 4 sts row 24 k2 k2tog 3 sts row 25 k1 k2tog 2 sts k2tog and fasten_off the acorns although there are two sizes of these there is not much difference between them the instructions below are for the smaller size with variations for the larger size in brackets first make the actual acorns these were knitted with rowan felted tweed 175 m / 50 g shade 160 and 2 75 mm / us size 2 needles using the long tail method cast on six stitches row 1 purl row 2 k1 m1 k1 three times 9 sts now work 7 9 row in stocking stitch beginning with a purl row next row k1 k2tog three times 6 sts next row purl cut the yarn thread through the remaining stitches and join the side seam stuffing the acorn as you go a knitting needle is useful here to push the stuffing in gather the cast on end and fasten_off if you then thread the end through to the other end of the acorn and fasten it off tightly it will flatten one end slightly for the top the acorn cups were knitted with stylecraft special dk
